home_heading_subheading: Get easy access to products in your home to better plan your purchases, meals and time.
home_section1_heading: Create your own categories and add products
home_section1_subheading: The names of the categories are arranged alphabetically, which makes it easy to find them. You can also add your own pictures and photos.
home_section2_subheading: Quickly add and remove the selected product. You can change categories and check if the product has passed its expiry date.
home_section3_subheading: Thanks to the search engine, you will find all similar products as well as a specific product.
